# Insert

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert me
.
<p>^^insert me</p>
````````````````````````````````


## normal insert

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert me^^
.
<p><ins>insert me</ins></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
foo ^^insert me^^
.
<p>foo <ins>insert me</ins></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert me^^foo
.
<p><ins>insert me</ins>foo</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert me^^^
.
<p>^^insert me^^^</p>
````````````````````````````````

## escape insert

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert me\^^^
.
<p><ins>insert me^</ins></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert \^\^ me^^
.
<p><ins>insert ^^ me</ins></p>
````````````````````````````````

## insert link

```````````````````````````````` example
^^insert [me^^](/)
.
<p><ins>insert [me</ins>](/)</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
^^[hello](/)^^
.
<p><ins><a href="/">hello</a></ins></p>
````````````````````````````````
